Reviews.Title: Beautiful phone for girls!
Reviews.Author: Siyun Wang
Reviews.Content: I always love pink, so this phone is perfect for me.The windows system is easy to use and these APPs are good,too.It is an AT&T; phone but unlock code is provided so it is easy to unlock.Thank you

Reviews.Title: THE PHONE IS GREATTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT
Reviews.Author: Goddessofwealth23
Reviews.Content: The phone is great, but the downside is the metal part on the back gets scratched fast. I really recommend !!!

Reviews.Title: what I thing
Reviews.Author: keino
Reviews.Content: Because the person's and other like it and it working best but I find it is not the best price could of be cheaper that it is become is not the best best it just good

Reviews.Title: Curious
Reviews.Author: Charles F.
Reviews.Content: I'm sure this phone will work for me just as it did said inother reviews, iI just ordered it but I'm kind of paranoid that it won't work. I have at&t; so I'm sure it should work. If it does then I will be very much pleased and happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: finally got smart
Reviews.Author: zahava frist
Reviews.Content: all in all good phonehowever i cant figure out how to use the zune music thingalso the app store is very limitedyou cant connect via bluetooth to other phones for some reason i can't figure outcamera is awesomethe screen is clear and doesnt get scratched up

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: widemisses
Reviews.Content: Appears to be very durable no doubt about that but sim card couldnt fit, I had 2 cut my sim to fit, info about phone did not say it was mini sim.. very hard to pair with other phones for bluetooth.. but I like it, it works

ProductInfo.Name: Nokia Lumia 900 4g Windows GSM Unlocked Phone, Pink
